item.darksouls.large_soul_of_a_lost_unde: Large Soul of a Lost Undead
advancements.darksouls.root.title: Dark Souls
advancements.darksouls.root.description: A Journey of heat and cold, light and dark and, of course, life and death
advancements.darksouls.light_bonfire.des: Enkindle a bonfire with your Darksign
advancements.darksouls.obtain_biggest_es: Upgrade an Estus Flask with Estus Shards until it reaches the maximal storage of Estus
advancements.darksouls.get_max_estus_hea: Upgrade a bonfire's Estus Heal Level until maximum
tooltip.darksouls.estus_flask: Fill with Estus at bonfires, and drink to restore HP.
tooltip.darksouls.estus_flask.extended: An emerald flask forged with a Fire Keeper's soul. They live to protect their flame, and die to protect it further. The Undead treasure these dull green flasks.
tooltip.darksouls.fire_keeper_soul: Consume to get 5 Humanity. It is an ingredient for the Estus Flask.
tooltip.darksouls.fire_keeper_soul.exten: Soul of a long-lost Fire Keeper. Each Fire Keeper is a corporeal manifestation of her bonfire and a draw for the humanity which is offered to her. Her soul is gnawed by infinite humanity.
tooltip.darksouls.emerald_flask: Forge it with a Fire Keeper's Soul to make an Estus Flask.
tooltip.darksouls.emerald_flask.extended: A long time ago this shiny Emerald Flask would have been a pretty valuable item, but instead of wealth, this little bottle can serve another purpose.
tooltip.darksouls.darksign: Returns its bearer to the last bonfire rested at.
tooltip.darksouls.darksign.extended: The Darksign signifies an accursed Undead. Those branded with it are reborn after death, but will one day lose their mind and go hollow. And so it is they are driven from their homeland.
tooltip.darksouls.estus_shard: Can be used to enlarge an Estus Flask.
tooltip.darksouls.estus_shard.extended: A shard soaked in Estus. Over the ages, countless souls rested their bones as they drank from the original flask. And now this shard remains, serving as a vestige of their hopes and dreams.
tooltip.darksouls.humanity: Consume to gain 1 Humanity and restore a large amount of HP.
tooltip.darksouls.humanity.extended: Rare tiny black sprite found on corpses. This black sprite is called humanity, but little is known about its true nature. If the soul is the source of all life, then what distinguishes the humanity we hold within ourselves?
A straight sword with a broken blade. A weapon with no exceptional qualities. Only a mad Hollow would choose to fight with this.
tooltip.darksouls.homeward_bone: Return to last bonfire used for resting.
tooltip.darksouls.homeward_bone.extended: Bone fragment reduced to white ash. Bonfires are sustained by bones of the Undead. In rare cases, their previous owner's strong urge to seek bonfires enchant their bones with a homeward instinct.
tooltip.darksouls.undead_bone_shard: Cast it into a bonfire to boost the recovery provided by the Estus Flask.
tooltip.darksouls.undead_bone_shard.exte: Undead bones that yet burn. The bonfire's cinders are the bones of Undead, and a bone that still burns is a fresh cinder indeed. Before feeding upon death, one must first pray to it.
tooltip.darksouls.straight_sword_hilt.ex: The hilt of this lost sword. Only slightly better than one's bare hands, and not recommended for extensive use.
tooltip.darksouls.demon_great_hammer.ext: A Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees. Used by lesser demons at the Undead Asylum. This hammer is imbued with no special power, but will merrily beat foes to a pulp, provided you have the strength to wield it.
tooltip.darksouls.dagger.extended: This standard small dagger has only a modest attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession, and is effective in critical hits such as after a parry or when stabbing in the back. With both slash and thrust attacks this dagger is useful in various situations.
Soul of a lost Undead who has long ago gone Hollow. Souls are the source of all life, and whether Undead, or even Hollow, one continues to seek them.
tooltip.darksouls.large_soul_of_a_lost_u: Large soul of a lost Undead who has long ago gone Hollow. Souls are the source of all life, and whether Undead, or even Hollow, one continues to seek them.
tooltip.darksouls.heater_shield.extended: Small metal shield. A standard, widely-used shield. This shield is easy to use, and is one of the smallest shields that offers 100% physical damage reduction.
tooltip.darksouls.dingy_hood.extended: Worn by the Fire Keeper at Firelink Shrine. It is thought to have once been the white hood of a maiden, but smoke and ashes from bonfires darkened it over the years.
tooltip.darksouls.dingy_robe.extended: Worn by the Fire Keeper at Firelink Shrine. It is thought to have once been the white robe of a maiden, but smoke and ashes from bonfires darkened it over the years.
tooltip.darksouls.blood_stained_skirt.ex: Worn by the Fire Keeper at Firelink Shrine. It is thought to have once been the white skirt of a maiden, but its true origin is lost in patches of blood. Perhaps its former wearer was maimed to prevent escape?
tooltip.darksouls.chainmail_helmet.exten: A chainmail helm of thin interlinking rings of steel. It is common throughout the human world since it can be easily produced, it is not too heavy, and offers good defense. Knights may favor flashy armor, but for warriors on the battlefield, anything is fine as long as it keeps them alive.
tooltip.darksouls.chainmail_chestplate.e: Chainmail armor of thin interlinking rings of steel. It is common throughout the human world since it can be easily produced, is not too heavy, and offers good defense. Knights may favor flashy armor, but for warriors on the battlefield, anything is fine as long as it keeps them alive.
tooltip.darksouls.chainmail_leggings.ext: Chainmail leggings of thin interlinking rings of steel. It is common throughout the human world since it can be easily produced, it is not too heavy, and offers good defense. Knights may favor flashy armor, but for warriors on the battlefield, anything is fine as long as it keeps them alive.
tooltip.darksouls.chainmail_boots.extend: Chainmail boots of thin interlinking rings of steel. It is common throughout the human world since it can be easily produced, it is not too heavy, and offers good defense. Knights may favor flashy armor, but for warriors on the battlefield, anything is fine as long as it keeps them alive.
tooltip.darksouls.winged_spear.extended: A long-hilted spear with a barbed point. Long reach, and can be used with shield up. Effective against hard exteriors, and hits for high damage at the right moment of an enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small, and it is easily blocked by shields.
tooltip.darksouls.zweihander.extended: One of the gigantic straight greatswords. As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held with two hands, but its wielder must still be inhumanly strong. It is this great weight that sends foes flying when hit solidly.
tooltip.darksouls.lordran_warrior_helm.e: Helm worn by the warriors of Lordran. Although it is made of iron, it is old, battered and worn out. It is wise to wear a sturdy form of head protection against arrows and other physical threats.
Armor worn by the warriors of Lordran. It is made of thick leather that is tattered with age.
tooltip.darksouls.lordran_warrior_waistc: Waistcloth worn by the warriors of Lordran. It is so tattered that it barely serves its purpose anymore.
Boots worn by the warriors of Lordran. Although only one of them is left.
tooltip.darksouls.long_press_counter: Defines how long a key has to be pressed to be recognized as holding the key.
gui.darksouls.fire_keeper_absent: Fire Keeper is absent. Cannot light bonfire
gui.darksouls.darksign_didnt_work: Your have not been linked to a bonfire before
gui.darksouls.reverse_hollowing_tooltip: Offer 1 Humanity to regain your human form.
gui.darksouls.not_enough_humanity: You have not enough humanity to do this.
gui.darksouls.kindle_tooltip: Offer 1 Humanity to kindle the bonfire and raise the amount of estus you can gain from it.
gui.darksouls.already_human: You are already in human form
gui.darksouls.not_human: You have to be in human form to do this
gui.darksouls.estus_heal_level_tooltip:
Estus Heal Level 
§7Raise by throwing an undead bone shard into the bonfire. This raises the amount of health you can get from drinking estus obtained from this bonfire.
gui.darksouls.estus_volume_level_tooltip:
Estus Volume Level 
§7Raise by kindling. This raises the amount of estus you can catch from this bonfire
item.great_hammer.smash.sub: Great Hammer hits the ground too hard
item.ultra_greatsword.smash.sub: Ultra Greatsword hits the ground too hard
dialogue.darksouls.fire_keeper.0: Welcome to my bonfire, Accursed Undead.%I am a Fire Keeper.
dialogue.darksouls.fire_keeper.1: Speak thine heart's desire.%So that I may help you.
dialogue.darksouls.fire_keeper.1.estus_s: Is that an Estus shard you've found?%Here, let me see it.%So that I may help you.
dialogue.darksouls.crestfallen_warrior.0: Well, what do we have here?%You must be a new arrival.%Let me guess. Fate of the Undead, right?%Well, you're not the first.%But there's no salvation here.%You'd have done better to rot in the Undead Asylum...%But, too late now.
dialogue.darksouls.crestfallen_warrior.1: Oh, your face!%You're practically Hollow.%But who knows, going Hollow could solve quite a bit!%Hah hah hah hah...%Hm, what?%Restoring your humanity?%Well, there are a few ways to go about it...%You could collect it bit by bit from corpses.%But the quickest way, although I'd never do it, is to kill a healthy Undead, and pillage its humanity.%Coveting thy neighbour is only human, after all!%Hah hah hah hah...%What are you looking at?%Don't try anything clever.%You might regret it.
dialogue.darksouls.crestfallen_warrior.2: Bloody hell, what is it now?%You ask too many questions.%I'm not up for chatting.%Leave me alone.
container.reinforce_estus_flask.title: Reinforce Estus Flask
